comments.body: Seems a bit tricky to say that _to_ is the variable where iteration starts _from_ ðŸ˜‰  But I can see it both ways, so being clear in the javadocs is good enough for me

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +65,69 @@     *
     * @param from The first key that could be in the range, where iteration ends.
     * @param to   The last key that could be in the range, where iteration starts from.
     * @return The reverse iterator for this range, from largest to smallest key bytes.
     * @throws NullPointerException       If null is used for from or to.

comments.body: Please leave an empty line above to separate parameter description from the description of the method.
